org.lafayette.server.web.nonce

Class NonceCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lafayette.server.web.nonce.NonceCache

  •  class NonceCache
extends Object
    Auto cleaning cache for nonce. XXX Consider using byte[] instead of string.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int capacity
      Maximum number of nonces to cache.
      private static int DEFAULT_CAPACITY
      Default capacity.
      private static int DEFAULT_THRESHOLD
      Default threshold.
      private List<String> nonces
      Collects the nonce strings.
      private int threshold
      If size() >= capacity - capacity / threshold then garbage collect.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NonceCache()
      Initializes capacity with DEFAULT_CAPACITY and threshold with DEFAULT_CAPACITY.
      NonceCache(int capacity, int threshold)
      Dedicated constructor.

        See Also:

        Maximum number of nonces to cache.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NonceCache

        public NonceCache()
        Initializes capacity with DEFAULT_CAPACITY and threshold with DEFAULT_CAPACITY.

      • NonceCache

        public NonceCache(int capacity,
          int threshold)
        Dedicated constructor.
        Parameters:
        capacity - maximum number of cached NONCEs, must not be less than 1
        threshold - used determine if garbage collection is needed, must not be less than 1 and must be less than capacity

    • Method Detail

      • has

        public boolean has(String nonce)
        Whether the caches has a NONCE value or not.
        Parameters:
        nonce - asked for
        Returns:
        true if the cache has this value, else false

      • add

        public void add(String nonce)
        Add a NONCE to the cache. Throws IllegalArgumentException if a NONCE was already added to the cache. Also calls garbageCollection() as last operation.
        Parameters:
        nonce - value to cache CHECKSTYLE:OFF
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if you try to add a nonce twice CHECKSTYLE:ON

      • size

        public int size()
        Return number of cached NONCEs.
        Returns:
        never les than 0

      • garbageCollection

        private void garbageCollection()
        Determine if garbage collection is necessary, and if, delete old NONCEs from cache.

      • shouldDoGarbageCollection

        static boolean shouldDoGarbageCollection(int size,
                                int capacity,
                                int threshold)
        Calculates if it is necessary to run garbage collection. Garbage collection is done if: 
         size >= capacity - capacity / threshold
        Parameters:
        size - current size of cache, must not be less than 0
        capacity - current capacity of cache, must not be less than 1
        threshold - current threshold of cache, must not be less than 1 and must nut be greater or equal capacity
        Returns:
        true if garbage collection should be run, else false
